ygData.subject: Re: crookstinger.  Magic weapon ****SPOILER****
ygData.msgSnippet: What level where you when you killed Crookstinger and were you solo, or with a party? Edywin Xegony ... From: Spehar, David J
ygData.messageBody:
What level where you when you killed Crookstinger and were you solo, or with
a party?

Edywin
Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Spehar, David J <David.Spehar@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 1:13 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: crookstinger. Magic weapon ****SPOILER****


> From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>
> Crookstinger always seemed to be around the Orc Camp by the end of a path.
> He just sort of wanders through and seems to be a rare spawn as is Old
> Dimmshimmer and the queen spider (she is named also).
>
> I killed crookstinger by the Orc Camp (end of path). Wish I had a better
> description of the orc camp im talking about but there are only 2 orc
camps
> ther that I know of. One orc camp is by the Wood Elf camp(thats NOT the
> right area).
>
> - Ziff
>
